title: Fermyon Says WebAssembly on Kubernetes Is Now Doable
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Fermyon offers Kubernetes support to its Spin tool with the release of open source SpinKube and Fermyon Platform for Kubernetes.
cntitle: Fermyon 称 Kubernetes 上的 WebAssembly 现已可行
cndescription: Fermyon 通过发布开源 SpinKube 和 Kubernetes 的 Fermyon 平台，为其 Spin 工具提供 Kubernetes 支持。
